title: WNBA Has Record-Low Attendance In '15; Stars Down Big At Temporary Venue
content: The WNBA drew its smallest average attendance on record this year, averaging 7,318 fans per game during the '15 season. That figure is down 3% from last season and below the previous low of 7,457 in '12. The WNBA hit a high mark of 10,864 fans per game during its sophomore season in '98 an...
